mapper.select: SELECT username, authentication_timestamp, success, administrative_action_for_unlock FROM account_authentication_log WHERE username = #{username} AND success = #{isSuccess} ORDER BY authentication_timestamp DESC LIMIT #{nbLog}

SELECT username, authentication_timestamp, success, administrative_action_for_unlock FROM account_authentication_log WHERE username = #{username} AND authentication_timestamp BETWEEN #{from,typeHandler=DateTimeTypeHandler} AND #{to,typeHandler=DateTimeTypeHandler} ORDER BY authentication_timestamp DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_authentication_log ( username, authentication_timestamp, success, administrative_action_for_unlock ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{authenticationTimestamp, typeHandler=DateTimeTypeHandler}, #{isSuccess}, #{isAdministrativeActionForUnlock} )
